Package demoreee

Class LevelData

java.lang.Object
demoreee.LevelData
public class LevelData
extends java.lang.Object
The LevelData class implements the level generation mechanism.

    • clearSpawn

      private static int clearSpawn​(int temp, int i, int j)
      A function that clears the spawn.
      Parameters:
      temp - - The temp variable.
      i - - Counter.
      j - - Counter.
      Returns:
      - It will either return 1 if it at the bottom level to guarantee the you can walk a spawn area or a 0 if its at level 2 or 3 so one can walk through it.

    • gen

      private static int gen()
      A function that generates floors wtihout a specific design.
      Returns:
      - It will either return 1 if it at the bottom level to guarantee the you can walk a spawn area or a 0 if its at level 2 or 3 so one can walk through it.

    • bottomGen

      private static int bottomGen()
      A function that generates specifically the bottom floor.
      Returns:
      - It will either return 1 if it at the bottom level to guarantee the you can walk a spawn area or a 0 if its at level 2 or 3 so one can walk through it.

    • diagonalBlockKill

      private static char[][] diagonalBlockKill​(char[][] arrLvl, int xcoor, int ycoor)
      A function that prevents a start shaped wall from spawning. It doesn't look pleasing and block the player unnecesarily
      Parameters:
      arrLvl - - The level array.
      xcoor - - The x coordinate.
      ycoor - - The y coordinate.
      Returns:
      - The level array that avoids the star shaped wall from spawning.
